solution_line_template: Between Shop A and Shop B he buys {shop_a_bottles} bottles+{shop_b_bottles} bottles=<<{shop_a_bottles}+{shop_b_bottles}={ab_total}>>{ab_total} bottles
Thus he can buy {total_bottles} bottles-{ab_total} bottles=<<{total_bottles}-{ab_total}={shop_c_bottles}>>{shop_c_bottles} bottles from shop C
